secondary: intensive: sāsvar- -- desiderative: sisvariṣa- susvūrṣa- -- causative: svaryate svārayati
derivatives: -svar svára AV.B. svará V.+ svaryà RV. svārá V.+ -svārya C. sváraṇa RV. -svaras RV. svarí? RV. sváru? V.B.S. sváritṛ RV. -svartṛ RV. svarīyas C. svarayitavya C.
Hardly to be separated from this root are the derivatives showing the radical sense of 'brightness': namely,svàr V.+ -svara U.C. sū́ra V.B. sūrí? V.+ sū́rya V.+ sū́rta? V.
